Title: Showgirls
Plot: Louis decides to help showgirls organize, but the Watt brothers stand in his way. A video of Gil John hitting a soldier with a chair in Afghanistan goes viral so Maddie looks for a way to humanize him and Andy's Vanity Fair cover shoot takes an unexpected direction.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Cynthia Nixon, Amy Sedaris, Wanda Sykes, Julie White, Haley Joel Osment, Tony Plana, Alicia Sable, Brooke Bloom, Kobi Libii, Ben Rameaka, Bjorn Dupaty, Amy Hohn, Ted King, Simon Feil, Eli James, Ilana
